about_the_game:
Modern diesel duty drops anchor in Train Sim World 4! Return to the portside town of Aschaffenburg, Germany and embark on Regionalbahn services along the stunning Main Valley. No wires, no fuss, your next adventure awaits aboard the sleek DB BR 642 DMU, wind your way to Miltenberg on the Maintalbahn!

Embark on single-track service across the picturesque Maintalbahn, characterised by slower running, local towns and villages, and passing loops for oncoming traffic. Between the passenger action, hustle freight from local industries and serve the Main River port.

Many rural lines still retain the need for fuel-powered traction, and since the turn of the century, the DB BR 642 has been a common sight. Ordered in the 1990s, the BR 642 is a 2-car DMU designed to be operated on local routes, featuring an innovative low floor and boarding design for increased accessibility, and mounted upon a shared bogie to improve safety and ride quality. All while, the low floor also gives the 642 its distinctive large windows for ultimate scenic viewing.

Alongside the railcar is another familiar sight on diesel lines, the BR 363 shunter, rolling along with wagons in-tow to deliver all manner of goods.

Stick to the timetable and keep the single-track line running smoothly, take on the task of refuelling the local diesels, and run efficiently so you don’t run out yourself! Explore rails near and far by taking the 642 out with Free Roam or keep it at home on the Maintalbahn for Train Sim World 4.

Key Features

  • 37 km route from Aschaffenburg to Miltenberg + 4 km Aschaffenburg port area

  • Included rolling stock:

    • DB BR 642 DMU in Westfrankenbahn, Bwegt and Bahnland Bayern DB Red livery

    • DB BR 363 diesel shunter in blue livery

    • DB Habbiins and Roos-t wagons

  • Highly detailed, feature-rich, driving cabs

  • True-to-life performance and handling

  • Accessible Tutorials on the Training Center

  • 5 engaging Scenarios and an authentic Timetable

  • Journey Mode tying together Training, Scenarios and Timetabled Services

  • A selection of Route Tasks to complete

  • Explore the route and trains in Free Roam

  • Livery Designer and Scenario Planner compatible. Share your creations with the Creators Club

  • Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology

  • Download size: 4.6 GB
